message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.IR

This paper deals with activity recognition in egocentric videos using a 3D CNN architecture. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the performance of the CNN, which suggests that it may fall under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the use of optical flow, which is a common technique in video processing, indicating that it may belong to cs.MM (Multimedia). Additionally, the paper discusses the difficulty of browsing egocentric videos, which suggests that it may fall under the category of cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Finally, the paper discusses the classification of videos as egocentric or not, which suggests that it may belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
